title: JS DOM objects
content:
(Document Object Model)
programming interface for HTML, XML, and SVG docs. Although often accessed using JS, DOM is not part of the JS language.

  1. Window Obj - top of hierarchy. Outmost element.
  2. Document Obj - contents of page. HTML loaded into a window.
  3. Form Obj - everything enclosed in <form>...</form> tags
  4. Form Control Obj - text fields, buttons, checkboxes

The Legacy DOM
The W3C DOM
The IE4 DOM
